review: I'm lovin' the Fire Stick so far. We have a second home with no cable, but with WiFi. I used to watch TV via my Kindle Fire and a HDMI chord. I take full advantage of Prime content. The biggest differences are that I don't have to take the device back and forth with me all of the time and that now I have a remote. The streaming seems to be pretty consistent even though I live in the land of spotty internet service. At this price point, you can't go wrong with the Fire Stick!

review: Every Playon owner should get this stick.  Been using since Oct 14.  To get Playon to work install playon on your android phone or tablet, so now it shows up in your list of purchased apps.  Next side load playon onto the fire stick.  Go to apps launch it.  Next install from app store, will connect the 2 and playon now shows up as an app for you in your recent list.  I watch prime movies\tv and playon, this thing works as well as my sony bluray player, great device.
